name: Stomper - Reborn
description:
Try to collect all the spheres, except one that are incollectable.

Sounds easy, but it is not.


Features:
-The incollectable sphere is randomly choosen. Use your intiution to find out which one.

- Compete with yourself by beating your own highscore


Six power-ups (comes at random when colliding with the red sphere)
,,,,well, one of them is pretty negative.
